content:
Updates: :tada:

  • Prelude: future_prelude_collision lint merged! (Thanks @jam1garner!) Small bug fix still needs to be merged.
  • Reserved prefixes: Implementation + migration merged! :tada:
  • IntoIterator for arrays lint updates: merged! :tada:
  • Disjoint captures: Lint updating and auto-enabling it on 2021 is in progress. PRs open! :tada:
  • Crater run preparation: no progress
Disjoint capture update: PRs open to allow users to submit size profile, and for an optimization we made for reducing closure size based on profiling rustc
